author: Victor Garcia
title: Cruz slams China as 'a threat to national security and global health'
description: Sen. Ted Cruz, R-Texas, called Wednesday for China to be held accountable for its role in the coronavirus pandemic, telling "The Story with Martha MacCallum" the virus could have been contained as a "regional outbreak" had Beijing's Communist government acted…
content:
